common.welcome: Ximopanolti in Cooperativa San Juan Tahitic

highlights.natureText: Tepetlmeh, atoyatlmeh huan atzatzintin tlen quiyolchicahuaj huan quipialiaj neltiliztli. Ximoyetztli ipan ohtli tlen ixiptla huan ximonechicoa iwan totlalnamiquiliztli.
highlights.gastronomyText: Tlakualmeh tlen quimatiltiaj totlamantli huan tlen yancuic. Xiquitac tlatlamantli tlen huejcahuac ipan tiankiztli huan calli tlacualoyan tlen quichihuaj tlacualiztli tlen yolchicahuac.
highlights.communityText: Tlacamej tlen yolmelaj huan cualnescaj, mitzmacaj cencah yolpactli. Ximotlasojcamatli ipan tlamantli tlen altepetl huan xiquixmati in ixtlamatiliztli tlen yolihuan.
highlights.traditionsText: Ilhuitl, netotiliztli huan amatlapoualistli tlen quipialiaj in yancuic tlanelhuayotl. Xiquitac in ilhuitl tlen amo nechca huan xiquixmati in tlamachiliztli tlen quimajmactiaj totatahuan.

footer.description: Ce tlalticpac tlen tetlapitza yectli tlalticpac, tlamantli huan tepalehuilli. Xiquitta in touey calpulli tlen ticpia.
footer.rights: © 2025 San Juan Tahitic. Nochi tlen ticpia.

cards.exploreSubtitle: Xiquitac in cualli tlamantli tlen mitzchiya ipan inin tlalpan

adelaRestaurant.title: Comedor Doña Adela
adelaRestaurant.description: Xitlakua tlacualmeh tlen totlalpan, ipan tlamantli tlen huejcahuac huan yolcualiztli tlen tlanelhuayotl.

loversWaterfall.title: Atzatzin tlen Inemohuan
loversWaterfall.description: Xiquitac in atzatzin tlen cenca yejyectzin, tlapoyahui ipan tlaltequitl huan yolsewaltzin.

cabins.title: Cabañas mochihua 80%
cabins.description: Mochipa yancuic calmeh para motlalis, tlen tlapoyahuaj ipan tlaltequitl.

viewpoints.title: Tlachialoyan
viewpoints.description: Tlachializtli tlen huejcahuac para xiquitzquilia moilhuicayotl tlen amo poliwis.

dances.title: Netotiliztli
dances.description: Ximotlatlauh in yancuic tlanelhuayotl ipan netotiliztli huan cuicatl tlen huejcahuac.

rivers.title: Atoyatlmeh
rivers.description: Ximotlatzinto ipan in yejyectzin atoyatlmeh huan xiquitac in tlaltequitl tlen quinyecana.

culture.description: In touey tlamantli tlapialistli in iyollo San Juan Tahitic. Ximomachti in tlamantli, tlapohualiztli huan tlatolli tlen otetlapitza in tochantlaca tlamantli ipan huehue tlamantli.

calendar.subtitle: Amo san xiqupohua tlen totlamantli — ximotlatlauh, xiquitta huan xiquihuica mohuan.
calendar.rewardMessage: Xitlamitlacualti nochi para xiquixtia in stickermeh!
calendar.downloadAria: Xiquinmohui in amatl stickermeh tlen San Juan Tahitic
calendar.progressMessage: Xiquitzca se tlalnamictli para tlamitlacualtia motlamantli. Mochihualiztli: {current} de {total}.

modal.welcome: Ximopanoltih ika Cooperativa San Juan Tahitic
modal.completedRoute: Tikchihuato in Ohtli tlen Tlamantli uan otiktlapojtlali in stickers.

carousel.title: Xikmati in yolotl de
phrases: Xinechmati in tepetini itech tlamantli uan in ika yolmelahualiz.
Se netotiliz quitemoa se tlamantli... se ikxi, se yoliztli.
Kampa in tlali motlalia uan in toltekayotl mochiua se tlachialis.
In iyolo in Sierra tlapipitza San Juan Tahitic.
Motlajtol kalaki nican, kampa in tonalli motlatia.

culturesection.dancesDescription: Inin netotiliztli techilía in tlatol, in teotl uan in nemiliztli de San Juan Tahitic ika motlaloa uan in huehueyoliz.
culturesection.craftsDescription: Inin tlachihualiztli mochihua ika in tlahcuilohqueh tlen altepetl ika tlajtlamantli tlen momachtihqueh ika huehcayotl.
culturesection.languageDescription: Xikmati in Nahuatlahtolli: in ichan, in tlachiyaliztli axkan, uan in tlatol tlen motenehua San Juan Tahitic.
culturesection.gastronomyDescription: Xikmati in tlacualli huehca de San Juan Tahitic: tlaneltocayotl tlen altepetl, tlacualnextli uan tlamanalli ika yoltic.
culturesection.preservationDescription: Titequiti ika yolmelahuac para tlatlania uan tlatzotzona in tlahtolnemiliztli. Ika tlamachtihcayotl, nemilistli uan momachtillij, tipiya yolmelahuac in tlatol tlen techixmatia kemi altepetl.

language.description: Xikmati in yejyectli uan in tlachicahuac tlen totlahtolli, ika tlatolmej tlen mopanoltihqueh ika miyac xihuitl ipan toaltepetl tlen yejyectzin

crafts.description: Tlachihualiztli yejyectin tlen tlachihualtin totlalmeh ika tlamachtiliztli tlen mopanoltihqueh ika miyac xihuitl.
crafts.clickInstructionDesktop: Xikchihua clic ipan se tlamachihualiztli para xikmatis nochi itlamantli
crafts.clickInstructionMobile: Xiktzintla se tlamachihualiztli para xikmatis nochi itlamantli
crafts.showingAll: Tikkita nochi in tlamachihualiztli tlen onca
crafts.scrollHint: Tlen xiknextia achi tlahcoyan, timoyolcuepa campa opeu in tlamachihualiztli
crafts.noResults: Amo onca tlamachihualiztli ipan in tlalpan tlen ika.
crafts.visitDescription: Xikmati in tlachihualiztli tlen tlachihualtin ika inmanos. Se tlamachihualiztli xiknextia totlahtolli, totlalnamiquiliztli uan toyolotl.
crafts.navigationInstructions: Xicpatsoca ESC para xicpolo • ← → para ximotlaloa
crafts.closeZoomInstructions: Xicpatsoca ESC o xicchihua tlaixpan para xicpolo

modal.keyboardShortcuts: Xipitzā ESC para tzatzili • ← → para nemi
modal.zoomInstructions: Xipitzā ESC o xitlāklik tlapan para tzatzili

tooltip.mobileInstruction: Xitlāklik ika se tlamantli para tikmatis in itlahcuilol, in huehca tlamachtiliztli, huan tikixmatis in tlamachtihquetl tlen oquichiu.
tooltip.desktopInstruction: Xikklik ika se tlamantli para tikmatis in itlahcuilol, in huehca tlamachtiliztli, huan tikixmatis in tlamachtihquetl tlen oquichiu.
tooltip.mobileNavigationTip: Noijki tihueli tlamanilia ipan in modal para timoneki
tooltip.desktopNavigationTip: Noijki tihueli tiktequiti in flechas ← → para timoneki

gastronomy.description: Xikmachi in tlamaniliztli tlen totlalpan, campa sesen tlacual tlanonotza se tlatolli tlen huehca nemiliztli, tlachializtli huan in tlen ixiptlatoc ika tetlasojtlalistli.
gastronomy.hoverVideo: Xikmokayotza ika in cuauhtlan para tikitta in video

gastronomysection.description: Xikmachi in tlacualmeh tlen tipikoj, in tlamantli tlen totlalpan huan in tlamachtiliztli tlen quimaca in tlamaniliztli ipan San Juan Tahitic. Se tlamaniliztli tlen quinechihua tikonemiliaj in toixiptla.

tooltip.title: ¡Xinejnemi ika fasililistli tlakualkalmeh!
tooltip.description: Ximomachtia nochi tlakualkalmeh amo xikpolokakan mochan

hero.useArrows: Xiktekiti in flechajmeh para xikitta okachi tlamantli

featuredDishes.discoverFlavors: Xikmomachtia in yajatlmeh tlen techixmatia uan techpialia yolotl in tlachihualmeh

platillos.title: Yajatlmeh San Juan Tahitic
platillos.clickInstruction: Xikchiya ipan se tlakualilistli para xikmomachtia itlahtolli
platillos.description: Xikpanolti totlakualilistli tlen kuali uan tlachikawalistli. Sesen tlakualmeh kitemaka se tlahcuilolli tlen yajatl, tlatemilistli tlalmeh, uan tlamachtilistli tlen huejcau tlen kimatkeh in achto tlakatlamej.
platillos.ariaLabel: Xikchiya o xitlapo Enter para xikweititi
platillos.exploreOthers: Xikpanolti okse tlakualmeh, achto xikzakua nin tlakualmeh

screenReader.expanded: Mo ueyilijtok. Xi kitekiui nopa flechas tlen inejmatl uan inejmatl para tias o ESC para tijtsakuilis.
screenReader.gridView: Nexkayotl tlakualmeh ipan tlamantli. Xiktekiti ika tab para xinemi ipan tlakualmeh, uan ika flechajmeh para timoyolpachih.

modal.keyboardShortcuts: Xikchiya ESC para tzakua • ← → para ximonejnemi ika tlakualmeh

call.subtitle: Kampa se platillo kitemoa itlahtol, huan ses sabor kichiua se tlaneltokilistli amo polihui
call.inspirationalQuote: Amo san se tlakualli, yejua se nemilistli ika in yolkayotl San Juan Tahitic
call.waitingMessage: Timitskijkij toknihuan ika mikilistli ika noyollo

dance.description: Ximotlatzoma ipan ses mitotilistli ika klik, huan ximoyekketza ika
dance.tapToLearnMore: Xiktlakua o xiktlaj tla ika xikmatis okachi de nin mitotilistli
dance.ctaDescription: Xikmachili in tlapitzali huan in yolkatilistli tlen **macehualmej mitotilistli** ipan iyolotzin **San Juan Tahitic**. ¡Timitskijkij!
dance.invitationCard: Amatl tlen kualtilistli para visitas San Juan Tahitic
dance.panoramicView: Tlachiya hueyi tlen altepetl San Juan Tahitic

community.description: Titeipaniltik se familia tlatlatok ika totlal, tlamantli tlen totatahuan huan se hueyi yolkayotl tlen tikpialia ika tlayekanilistli. Xikmatis in makaj huan in yolmej tlen kichiwaj ma kuali San Juan Tahitic.

timeline.description: Se ojtli ipan tonali para xikmatis in tlachihualistli, altepemej huan tlacamej tlen kichiwaj totlachiyalistli.

present.description: Xikmatis kenijki tianij axkan: se kalpoli tlen kimapialia itlamachtilistli huan kimijmatis itlaneltokalis ika nemilistli huan se tlayekanilistli tlen ika kuali tlamantli.
present.numbersDescription: Tlatlamantli tlen kijtoaj in yolkatilistli huan in nemilistli San Juan Tahitic
present.source: Tlamachtiloyan: Consejo Comunitario de San Juan Tahitic
present.visitDescription: Xikitta ika moixtolol in kuali nemilistli huan in yolyekkan tlen San Juan Tahitic. Timitskijkij para ximokopati ika tochan, maski san se tonali.

pillars.title: Tequio (Tlachikualistli Se Tlanemilistli)
pillars.description: In tequio mochihua se tlapechtli tlen totlaneltokalis. Se hueyi tlamantli tlen totatah huan totatahhuan, para moneki tikchiwaj ika tlayekanilistli huan kuali nemilistli nochtin.

pillars.title: Tlakualilistli huan Tlalmixtilistli
pillars.description: Tlen milpa a tlakuali. Totlajtlakuali tlen elotl, etl huan kafetl, yejua in yolkatl tlen kitlaixmatia in tlatskayotl huan kiselia in tlamantli tlen tikuikas totlal.

pillars.title: Ilhuitl huan Tlamachtilistli
pillars.description: In tonalamatl tlen ilhuitl mochihua in yolotzin tlen totlamachtilistli. In mitotilistli, tlapitzali huan tlayolmelajli mochijtok ika tlamantli tlen kijtoa titechixmatia nochtin.

pillars.title: Tlamachtiloyan huan Tonemilis
pillars.description: Tikinvestiroaj ipan in telpocamej. Totlamachtiloyan mochijtok in kuauhtlajtlamachtiloyan para kiseliaj in telpocamej nemilistli ika tlamachtilistli huan amo kipolohua in itlahtol totatahhuan.

attractions.description: Se tlachiya ika in tlamantli tlen kipatlajtiaj San Juan Tahitic huan tlen ika kuali timopaktiskej sooni.

project.title: Kalmej para tlaneltokalistli (Fase I)
project.subtitle: Tlalpanili para itonemilis tlen Tajitik
project.description: Se tlamachtilistli tlen kalpoli para tikmakas se nemilistli tlen yolkamej huan tlen tekitilistli ika tlatskayotl. Kalmej tlen kipialia kuali nemilistli huan tikchiwaj ika tlamantli tlen totlalpan, para kualtia in tlatekitilistli huan in ecoturismo.

constructionImages.title: Tlaltekiliztli tlen kalmej
constructionImages.description: Tekitijtok ipan tlaltekiliztli ika tlamantli tlen amo tlapolojtik

constructionImages.title: Kuapajli tlen achto
constructionImages.description: Tekitilistli tlen kuapajli ika kuahuitl tlen totlalpan

constructionImages.title: Tlachiyalistli tlen tlamachtilistli
constructionImages.description: Panorámica tlen in tlachikualilistli tlen mochijtok

tequio.title: Tequio: Tlayekililistli Kalpolimej
tequio.subtitle: In tlamachtilistli tlen huejcamej tlen kipaktia totlalpan San Juan Tahitic
tequio.unitedForCommonGood: Timoyekketokej ika in kuali para nochi
tequio.heroDescription: In tequio yen yolotl tlen totlamachtilistli ipan San Juan Tahitic. Desde huejcaj, nin tekitilistli tlen timotlayekanaj ika tlatskayotl otikmopalehuijkej para tikchiwaj in tlamachtilistli: tiopan, ojtli, ameyalli huan timoyekketokej ika se tlayolmelajli tlen kipia in tonemilis ipan kalpoli.
tequio.projectsDescription: Tlamantli tlen tikchiwaj san sej para kuali tonemilis ipan totlalpan
tequio.benefitsDescription: In tlamantli kuali huan yolyekaj tlen tikpiaj ika nin tekitilistli tlen san sej timotekitiaj
tequio.testimonialsDescription: Tlen kijtoaj in totlayekankeh de tequio
tequio.heritageDescription: Ipan San Juan Tahitic, in tequio kuali mochipa kipia yolistli, yen tlayekililistli tlen totlamachtilistli. Techitlajtlachia para timotlayekketokej ika in tlayolmelajli huan kipia in tlamachtilistli tlen huejcamej para in tlayikpanimej tlen tlen tlakatlaj.

carousel.roadsDescription: Kalpoli timotlayekketokej ipan mopalehuia ojtli tlen altepetl
carousel.reforestationDescription: Tlakualka tlen kuahuitl nativoj para mopalehuia in tlalpan
carousel.schoolDescription: Tlatekitilistli san sej para kuali mochij in tlamachtiloyan
carousel.springDescription: Tlamachtilistli para mokualli in atatl tlen totlayolmelajli

projects.name: Mopajpalehuia Ojtli Tlen Altepetl
projects.description: Tlatekitilistli para mopajpalehuia huan mopajpatla in ojtli tlen kinmopantiaj in totlayekankeh huan tochaj, para kipia kuali tlamantli huan moneki seguridad para nochi.

projects.name: Tlaltepehuaztli Kalpoli
projects.description: Tlakualka tlen kuahuitl nativoj ipan tlali tlen tlamontok para mopalehuia in tonemilis huan in tlalpan.

projects.name: Mopajpalehuia Tlamachtiloyan
projects.description: Tlatekitilistli para mopajpatla huan mopalehuia in tlamachtiloyan, para in pilkonemej kipiaj se kuali kan mopanoltiaj.

projects.name: Mopajpalehuia Ameyalli
projects.description: Tlatekitilistli para mopajpalehuia huan mokualtij in ameyalli, kipiajtokej in tlamachtilistli tlen huejcamej.

benefits.title: Tlayolmelajli Kalpoli
benefits.description: Techmoyekketia ika familias huan tlayikpanimej, mochipa san sej tikpiaj tlayolmelajli

benefits.title: Tlayekililistli Ika Tlakatsintli
benefits.description: Tlamachtilistli tlen kipia kuali tonemilis para nochi huan mokualli in tlalpan

benefits.title: Tlamachtilistli Tlen Huejcamej
benefits.description: Timomoyekketiaj para kipia yolistli in tequio huan in tlayolmelajli tlen totatah

benefits.title: Autogestión (Tequipanolistli)
benefits.description: Tijtlachia in totlatlamantli ika totlayekankeh, amo kipia moneki eksternos

testimonials.name: Doña Rosa Martínez
testimonials.testimonial: In tequio techmoyekketia kemi se familia. Notelpokaj huan nonenpiltzin momachiliaj in tlayolmelajli tlen san sej tekitij. Nin yen tlamantli más kuali tlen otikselijkej de totatah.

testimonials.name: Juan Pérez
testimonials.testimonial: Cada tequio techmoyekketia kemi kalpoli. Tijtlachiaj in tlamantli tlen tikchiwaj huan timoskalijtok kemi altepetl. In tlayolmelajli techmoyekketia.

testimonials.name: María González
testimonials.testimonial: Tequipanoj telpokamej tikchiwaj ika tequio para mopalehuia huan kipia yolistli in tlamachtilistli. Nin yen totlayekililistli para San Juan Tahitic.

gastronomymodal.title: Tlakualistli:
gastronomymodal.subtitle: tlatskayotl tlen huejcayotl
gastronomymodal.description: Tlen milpampa hasta mesa: tikpiyah totlalpan uan tlasenkaltij tlen totlakualis kuali tlen San Juan Tahitic.
gastronomymodal.heroDescription: San Juan Tahiticpan, tlali amo san techmaka tlakuali, noijki techmaka tlamantli tlen teixiptla. Totlamilpaj uan totlakualistli tlen huejcayotl kuali in huehuehuejmeh techmiktiah kenik timoyeknemih ika tlaltikpak.
gastronomymodal.productsDescription: Tlakualmeh tlen tikualtiah ika tlamantli tlen kipiyah tlatskayotl, uan tlatlakualilistli tlen kuali para tlaltikpak.
gastronomymodal.flavorsDescription: Tlakualmeh tlen panoah de generación ipan generación, tlatlamanilistli tlen totlalpan kuali.
gastronomymodal.knowledgeDescription: Tlamatilistli tlen techpaleuia tlamantli totlalpan uan totlakualis.
gastronomymodal.heritageDescription: San Juan Tahiticpan, sesen tlakuali tlahtoa se historia; sesen tlasenkali kipiya se nemilistli. Totlakualistli yolok se tlenmiktiaya tlen totlalpan uan tokniuan.
gastronomymodal.heritageTag: San Juan Tahitic - Tlasenkaltih tlen ayik poliwiskeh

carousel.cornDescription: Totlaol tlen huejcayotl, ipan yehuatl mopajsolti totlakualistli.
carousel.moleDescription: Tlakuali tlen yancuik ipan nemilistli tlen huejcayotl.
carousel.coffeeDescription: Tikualtiah ipan tepemeh, ika se tlatskayotl tlen tlahuel kuali.
carousel.tamalesDescription: Tlasenkaltih tlen panoah de huehuehuejmeh hasta tlayi.

products.name: Maíz Criollo
products.description: Tlaolmeh tlen huejcayotl tlen kipiyah tlasenkali uan tlamantli tlapajpanoli, tikualtiah ika milpaj.

products.name: Etl Tlen Yayauh
products.description: Tikualtiah ipan tepemeh; etl kipiya tlasenkali tzopelik uan tlamantli tlen techyoltilia.

products.name: Café de Tepetl
products.description: Café tlen tlaltikpak kuali, tlakualtli ipan 1,200 m, kipiya tzopelik uan tlasenkali tlen chocolate.

products.name: Tlalnakatl Tlen Tlapajpanoli
products.description: Tlamatilistli huejcayotl tlen tlakualistli ika xihuitl ken manzanilla, árnica uan yerbabuena.

dishes.name: Mole de Caderas
dishes.description: Tlakuali tlen tlamachtli ika chivo, chile uan chocolate. Totlakualistli tlen huejcayotl tlen San Juan Tahitic.

dishes.name: Tamales de Etl
dishes.description: Tamalli ika totlaol, temilti ika etl yayauh uan xihuitl tlen region.

dishes.name: Atole de Maíz Blanco
dishes.description: Atl tzopelik tlen tlaol blanco, canela uan piloncillo, tlakualistli para tonali tlen koyo.
dishes.preparation: Tlakualtli ipan metate uan tlen kuali tlachichinolistli

knowledge.title: Milpaj Tlamachtilistli
knowledge.description: Tlakualtli ika tlaol, etl uan ayoxochitl tlen kipiyah tlajtolilistli uan tlamantli tlen tlaltikpak.

knowledge.title: Nixtamalización
knowledge.description: Tlamachtilistli tlen kochi tlaol ika cal para kipiyah ixtlamatilistli uan tlasenkali.

knowledge.title: Tlatemilistli Tlen Tlaltikpak
knowledge.description: Tlamachtilistli tlen tlakualtli ika tonali uan tlakualtilistli para kixpiyah tlaol ipan xihuitl.

knowledge.title: Tlamachtilistli Tlen Xihuitl
knowledge.description: Tlamachtilistli tlen tikualtiah xihuitl para yolik tlapajpanolistli tlen familia.

festivities.title: Ilhuitl huan nemilistli
festivities.subtitle: Ipan San Juan Tahitic, tonemilis tlatlahtoah ica totlahtol huan totlahtolixmatiliztli
festivities.identityDescription: Nochi ilhuitl ipan San Juan Tahitic itech tlatskaj neltokayotl, tlamantli tlatemikilistli huan tlayekilistli. Totradiciones amo san tlatzontekonilotl, tlapowah ika tlen totatahua huan totlasojtla, tlamantli kuali tlatlahtol ixiptla itech tonemilis.
festivities.calendarDescription: Tlamantli tlen tlatskaj tonemilis ipan xiwitl
festivities.danceDescription: In motlaloa tlahtolli tlen tepohualia totlahtol huan totlahtolixmatiliztli
festivities.heritageDescription: Tlamantli tlen titlatlajtlalia, tlen tikchiwa totlahtolixmatiliztli kualika.
festivities.finalDescription: Ipan San Juan Tahitic, sesen ilhuitl mochihua tlahtolli yolilistli tlen totlasojkayotl. Totradiciones tlen tikuajxilia, in tlen tikmakaskeh in mopilhuan para amo poliwis totlahtolixmatiliztli.
festivities.whereTraditionLives: San Juan Tahitic - Kan yolia totradición

carousel.patronalDescription: Tlamanilistli ica tototemiki patron, ika procesiones huan meyayotzin tlanetzkayome
carousel.moorsDescription: Tlanetzka tlen tlayekilhuia tlatolmeh huehca, ika tlahcuiloli huan tlamantli tlen tonemilis
carousel.dayOfTheDeadDescription: Tlamantli altares huan tlachiwaliztli tlen tlamiktinmeh
carousel.carnivalDescription: Maskameh, kuikatl huan pakilistli ipan tlatskayotl
carousel.holyWeekDescription: Tlamanilistli tlen tlaneltokayotl tlen tlatskaj in tlaneltokakeh

festivals.name: Ilhuitl Patronal San Juan
festivals.description: Tlamanilistli ica tototemiki patron ika misa, procesión huan pakilistli tlen tlatskaj eyi tonali. Nochi tlakah motlasojtlah para kipalewiskeh in tlen totatahua.

festivals.name: Mikailhuitl
festivals.description: Titekitih totlamiktinmeh ika altares, ofrendas huan tlayohual tlachiwaliztli ipan panteón. Totradición tlen tlatlamantli ica tonemilis huan mikilistli.

festivals.name: Carnaval tlen meyayotzin
festivals.description: Ilhuitl tlen kuali tlatskaj achto Cuaresma ika maskameh, tlanetzkayome huan kuikatl ipan ohtli tlen altepetl.

festivals.name: Semana Santa
festivals.description: Tlamanilistli tlen tlayekilhuia in tlaijyohuilistli Cristo, ika tlatolme tlen tlaneltokakeh huan totradición huejcayotl.

dances.name: Tlanetzka Moros
dances.description: Tlanetzka tlen tlayekilhuia in tlahtekiliztli tlen moros huan kristianos, ika tlahcuiloli meyayotzin huan kuikatl ika ehekatl.

dances.name: Son de la Malinche
dances.description: Tlanetzka tlen tlayekilhuia tlaixmatilistli ika motlaloa tlen yolilistli, tlen itlaixmatilistli kualika.

dances.name: Los Chinelos
dances.description: Tlanetzka ica pakilistli huan saltos, ika maskameh tlen piltlahcuiloli huan bigotón, tlamantli pakilistli huan tlaixpan.

heritage.title: Kuikatl ika ehekatl meyayotzin
heritage.description: Bandas comunitarias tlen kipalewiah tlen kuikatl huehcayotl ipan ilhuitl.

heritage.title: Tlachiwaliztli tlen ilhuitl
heritage.description: Tlachiwaliztli maskameh, tlahcuiloli huan tlamantli ika tlatlamantli tlen totatahua.

heritage.title: Tlakualistli tlen tlaneltokayotl
heritage.description: Tlakualistli tlen tlamanilistli para sesen ilhuitl ika tlamantli huehcayotl.

heritage.title: Tlahtolli huan tlayekilhuajkayotl
heritage.description: Tlahtolmeh, huehuetlahtolli huan tlaixmatilistli tlen tikijtoske ika tlahtolli.

education.knowledgeCommunityPurpose: Canin tlamatiliztli quinnamiqui ipan tlen tocnihuan
education.investmentDescription: Titlamachtihuitzqueh ica in tonaleh yancuic tlen techpalehuis, amo tictlamihcuepahqueh in totnenepantla
education.educationDescription: Ipan San Juan Tahitic, in tlamachtilistli yohualnepantla in yolitztli ipan totlacualnepantla. Tiquintlatzotzonah in tlamatiliztli huehcapan ica in yancuic tlamachtiliztli, tlen quinchihualtia tlacameh tlamachihuan, tlamelajcan, uan quimottiliah tlen cualtzin para in toaltepetl.
education.educationPillarsDescription: In tlayehualiztli tlen quinyecana in totlamachtiloyan tocnihuan
education.educationalPathDescription: Se ohtli tlamachtiliztli tlen amo quihuetzis, desde in pilme hasta tlamachtiloyan hueyi
education.collectiveAchievementsDescription: Tlanahuatilmeh tlen quinehnemi in tequitiuh tlamantli tocnihuan tlamachtiloyan
education.finalMessage: Ipan San Juan Tahitic, noxcalpan se tlamachtiloyan quipiya yolmelahuac, noxpan se tlamachtiliztli quichihua ohtli para in tonaleh, uan noxpilme quipiyah in xinachtli tlen patla in toaltepetl uan in tlalticpac.
education.learningCreatesFutures: San Juan Tahitic – Canin tlamachtiliztli quichihua tonaleh

carousel.learningCommunityDesc: Tlamachtiltin quichihuah tequitl tlen quipalehuiah nochtin tocnihuan
carousel.educationalFacilitiesDesc: Calli tlen quinchihualiah para in cualtzin tlamachtiliztli uan in yolnemilistli
carousel.practicalActivitiesDesc: Tlamachtiliztli tlen quimonequi tlatolli uan tequitl ipan nelli tlalticpactli
carousel.academicCelebrationsDesc: Tlahueliloyan para in tlamantli uan tequitl tlen quichihuah tlamachtiltin
carousel.educationalTechnologyDesc: Tiquinpahuiah in tepoztlamantli yancuic ica in tlamachtiliztli huehcapan

institutionss.name: Jardín de Niños "María Montessori"
institutionss.description: Tlamachtiliztli achto tlen quinyecana in pilme ica yolmelahualiztli uan tocniuayotl, canin quimomachtiah ica mitoa uan nemiliztli tlen tlamachtiliztli.
institutionss.motto: Timomachtiah ica mitoa, ticmosehuiah ica tlen tiquixmatiyah

institutionss.name: Primaria "Benito Juárez"
institutionss.description: Tlamachtiliztli tlen quimpalehuia tlamantli huehcapan ica tlamachtiliztli tocnihuan, quinyolchicahua ica tlamachtiliztli uan nemiliztli tlen tlatolli huehcapan.

institutionss.name: Telesecundaria "Nezahualcóyotl"
institutionss.description: Tlamachtiliztli tlen ipan tlahcoyohualiztli ica tlayecaniliztli uan tequitl tocnihuan, quinyecana telpocameh para in nelli tlalticpactli yancuic.

institutionss.name: Bachillerato Comunitario
institutionss.description: Tlamachtiliztli hueyi ica tlayecaniliztli tequitiuh uan tocniuayotl, tlen quinchihualtia tlacameh tlayecantih tlen motlanequiliah ica in tocnihuan.

pillars.title: Tlamachtiliztli Cualtzin
pillars.description: Tlatemachtiliztli mochipa para quipiyah in tlamatiliztli uan tlamantli cualtzin

pillars.title: Tlayolmelahualiztli Tocniuayotl
pillars.description: Tiquinyolchicahua in totrahmatiliztli uan tlayolmelahualiztli tocniuayotl ipan nochtin tlamachtiltin

pillars.title: Yancuic Tlamachtiliztli
pillars.description: Tiquinpahuiah tepoztlamantli ica tlamachtiliztli tlen huehcapan

pillars.title: Tlamachtiliztli Cenyeliztli
pillars.description: Tlamachtiliztli ipan tlalticpac uan tequitl tlen amo quixpoloa in tlalticpactli

achievements.description: Tlahueliloyan nacional ica totlamachtiliztli tlen tocniuayotl uan mochipa
achievements.impact: In tlamachtiliztli quipalehuia ica 5 altepetl nechca

achievements.description: Ticchihuah nemiliztli ica hueyi tlamachtiloyan ipan México uan campa huehcauh
Ticpatlah in tlamachtiloyan ica energía yancuic uan diseño tlen quipalehuiya in tlalticpactli

cooperative.description: In Tlatlanahuatilistli Tocniuayotl CHIWANJMEJ uan Café Yektanesik quimoyolchicahuah in tlanamacayotl tlen toaltepetl ica tequitl tlen ipan tocnihuan: tlen cualtzin, tlapajli uan quipiya in yoltokayotl tlen totlahtol. Nochi tlen tictlanamaca quipalehuia xitlahuac in familias ipan San Juan Tahitic.

coffee.title: Café Yektanesik
coffee.description: Café tlen xochitlalpan, quinchihualtih in tocnihuan ica in tlatlaxtiliztli huehcapan uan yolpachihualiztli.

punch.title: Punche uan Tlapohualmeh Chiwanjmej
punch.description: Yancuic tlailpiyalli Punche uan tlapohualmeh artesanales ica itlahtol uan itlasohtlaliztli in toaltepetl.

soaps.title: Jabones Artesanales
soaps.description: Tiquinchihualiah ica xihuitl tlen tlachichihualiztli tlen tlaneltoca ipan in programa Sembrando Vida.

juices.title: Yektanesik Xocomecatl Atl
juices.description: Atl xocomecatl tlen tlali toaltepetl, 100% tlaneltocayotl uan patli.

impact.impactDescription: Nochi tequitl o tlanamacayotl tlen in tlatlanahuatilistli quichihua tlanahuatilli xitlahuac, quipiya in tlamantli huehcapan uan quinyolchicahua in tocnihuan ipan San Juan Tahitic.

cooperative.cta: Xiquitta in tlatlanahuatilistli tocniuayotl ipan San Juan Tahitic

services.collectionDescription: Xikmatika in tlamantli tlen monamikiya ika tequitl ihuan tetlasojtlalistli ipan totlalpan
services.noProductsDescription: Xikmatika okseki tlajtoli o xikpatla in filtros

cooperativesection.description: Xikmachi in neltiloyan tlen San Juan Tahitic. Tlamantli tlen kualojkej ika tlazohtlalistli, ika tlamantli tlen huejcauh, wan ika toyeknemilistli tlen moneki ika in toaltepetl seka.
cooperativesection.solidarityDescription: Se tlamanilistli kikpalewia in toaltepetl para ma kuali motlatok sepa wan ma momachti in huejcauh tlamantli.

testimonials.testimonio: No san nimitztojki ika noomiyo, nimitztojki noxochimej wan no tlamantli tlen ipan nemilistli...
In tlalli amo san se tlamantli, yejua tonan, tlen techpalehuia...
Tikchiwaj ika tlayolmelajka in to huejcauh, pero toicximej yayaj ika nekateh ipan tonemilis. Totech okse tlamantli: ma tlaltikpaktli kimomachi in to cultura.
testimonials.detalles: Tlatemojtij tlen tlayekanke ika nemilistli tlen yolistli

testimonials.testimonio: Nochi notlajtol tlen nemi ipan totlatzotzon mechyolmelajka itlamachiliz in tepemej wan atentli. Amo san tlatzotzonij, tlen nimitztokilia in yolik tlajtoli tlen to huejcauh.
testimonials.detalles: 50 xihuitl tlen kipia in tlajtoli tlen huejcauh

testimonials.testimonio: Nochan, in tlayekualo yejua se tlajtol tlazohtla in to tlalli. Nochi tlayekualo kitemachia se tlamantli tlen tlachikuali, tlatoka, wan tlajtlaneliloyan.
In tequio techilnamiktia nik sekan tiyolmelajka. Ika techyolmelajka, amo san tikchiwaj ojtli o kalmej, tikchiwaj in tlaneltokilistli tlen techmaseualtia.
Tlamachtia nika amo san timonextia tlamantli, yejua timopalehuia in konemej ma kixmatikan tlaneltokilistli tlen inin huejcauh wan inin tlen tlatikpaktli tlen yancuik.

header.title: Totlalpan tlajtoli
header.description: In tlajtoli tlen sesen tlakatl kipia se tlajtol tlen totlalnemilistli. Xiknakili, xikmachili, wan xikkalaktsaj in tlaneltokaj tlen kipiaj yolik in to San Juan Tahitic.

closing.title: In toton huehuehtlahtolmej
closing.subtitle: Cada tlahcuilolli quipāca in tekitl ipan achto wan axcan. Iuan tlatepanitasej, in totlajtolwan quichijchihuaj in timoikneltilis.
closing.description: San Juan Tahitic amo san se lugar… se yancuic tlahcuilolli, tlen totlacamej quipohualiaj.

contact.title: Tlamantli tlen nochi tlamantli
contact.subtitle: Tlamantli nochi San Juan Tahitic. Tlenka nimitstlatlauhka tlen nimitstlasojtlajtoua tlen tlamantli tlen moneki nochi tlamantli nemilistli.
contact.mapDescription: San Juan Tahitic nochi kalakamej tlen nemilistli tlen ika kalakamej. Ika tlahtoloyan tlen tlamantli, nochipa tochtli 2 tlamantli ika vehíkulo o tlamantli tlamantli.

contactForm.title: Tlamantli tlen nochi tlamantli
contactForm.name: Tlen ika *
contactForm.subject: Asunto *
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Nimitstlatlauhka ika tlamantli tlen tlamantli o nochipa nemilistli...

gallery.communityDescription: Nimitstlasojtlajtoua nochipa tlamantli ika tlamantli tlen San Juan Tahitic

video.altText: Kalakamej tlen nochipa - Klicka ika tlahtolkatl
video.discoverEssence: Tlamantli nochipa ika San Juan Tahitic

youtubeModal.videoTitle: San Juan Tahitic kalaki tlamantli video

tourism.mainDescription: San Juan Tahitic tlen tlamikilistli nemilistli ipan kualli tlamantli kualli tlen yancuikayotl iuan kalaki. Tichpoua kualli tlamantli tlen tichikawisa ipan tonali tlen tlakatl.
tourism.mountainTrailsDescription: Tlamikilistli ipan tetlapan kualli iuan xochitl tonalamatl iuan tlamantli nemilistli kualli.
tourism.naturalReserveDescription: Tichpoua kualli xochitl iuan tlatskanilistli iuan tlamantli tlen kualli iuan yancuikayotl ipan tlakatl.
tourism.riversWaterfallsDescription: Tlapowisa kualli atl, tlasojtlalistli tlen tlakatl iuan tlamikilistli kualli.
tourism.panoramicViewpointsDescription: Tlamikilistli kualli iuan tlamantli tlen xochitl ipan tonali tlen tlamantli yancuikayotl.
tourism.sustainabilityDescription: Tlen tlamikilistli tlatskanilistli tlen tlamikilistli kualli tlen tlamantli nemilistli ipan tlakatl iuan tonali. Tlen tlamikilistli tlen tichikawisa tlen tlamantli kualli tlen tlamantli kalaki.

tourismsection.description: Tichpoua in tlamantli, huehuetlahtolli iuan tlamikilistli tlen otechmaka yolistli ipan San Juan Tahitic. Se sekan tlamantli kipiya itlahtolli tlen itech tlatskanilistli iuan yolmelawalistli, tlen okitlalij in yoltetl iuan tlamantli kualli ipan tonali meyalli.

timelineSection.title: Tonalmachiyotl
timelineSection.legend: Se se tlatskanilistli kiteititia se huehuetlahtolli tlen kualli

voicesSection.title: Tlahtolmeh Tlen Kalaki
voicesSection.noTestimonials: Aksan titetlanilis tlahtolmeh tlen kalaki ika inin tlali.
